issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Create ExplainTask in ATS hook through ExplainWork

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Commands:
create table idtable(id string);
create table ctastable as select * from idtable;

With ATS hook:
2015-05-22 18:54:47,092 INFO  [ATS Logger 0]: hooks.ATSHook (ATSHook.java:run(136)) - Failed to submit plan to ATS: java.lang.NullPointerException

ATTACHMENT ID: 12735505 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
The test failures are unrelated. QA reports that it works. [~jpullokkaran] and [~ashutoshc], could you please take a look? Thanks.

+1 patch will fix the issue and is benign. However, it seems there are other places in that file that uses "work" and ultimately it might be better to not call this with null from ATS. Should be open a separate jira to make the ATSHook call the explain properly?
[~sushanth] ok for 1.2? Simple null check to avoid NPE in ATS hook.

+1 on backporting to branch-1.2

Unless the patch is a major API change or changes db schema, all patches are currently on auto-approve for branch-1.2 as long as the committer adds it to https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+1.2+Release+Status .
Committed to master and branch-1.2. Thanks [~pxiong]!
